abstract: Last Friday, Kenneth D. Lewis, chief executive of the Bank of America Corporation, was in his headquarters in Charlotte, N.C., pondering a possible acquisition of Lehman Brothers, the foundering investment bank.
lead_paragraph: Last Friday, Kenneth D. Lewis, chief executive of the Bank of America Corporation, was in his headquarters in Charlotte, N.C., pondering a possible acquisition of Lehman Brothers, the foundering investment bank.

headline.main: BofA’s Merrill Deal Brings Risks and Opportunity
